modName: Beyond Skyrim - Bruma Tree LOD billboards
summary: Bruma Tree Billboards for use with TES5LODGen or DynDOLOD.  Updated 8/9/18 all billboards optimized with proper dimensions
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=4]Tree LOD Billboards for Beyond Skyrim Bruma

by mobiusbelmont
[/size]
[img]https://68.media.tumblr.com/a7fc36e249ccbabd03b545a878cb2ee7/tumblr_oshvykLnhu1s2ptqso6_540.jpg[/img]



[size=4]GENERAL INFO:  
These billboards will allow the tree LOD for landscape overhauls, that change vanilla trees, to be fully compatible with[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84946/?] Beyond Skyrim Bruma[/url][/size]


[size=4]All large trees and some small shrubs are included  [/size]



[img]https://68.media.tumblr.com/bf62d75f71fcd057ee675b2fda2f16de/tumblr_oshvykLnhu1s2ptqso3_540.jpg[/img]




[size=4]Special note:  I suggest only regenerating tree LOD using either program listed below.  Myself and others have experienced errors attempting to generate static Object LOD with TES5LODGen.  ONLY TIC TREES, NOT OBJECTS!  




Installation:  

1. Install vanilla billboards and then the billboards for all other mods with tree LOD (include Bruma billboards).  Make sure to install the billboards in the [u][b]same order[/b][/u] that you installed your various tree mods


2. Run TES5LODGen or DynDOLOD.  Only generate [u][b]static tree LOD[/b][/u] with either program and [u][b]do not generate object and or dynamic LOD[/b][/u] (you will get errors...see [url=http://forum.step-project.com/topic/11997-dynamic-distant-objects-lod-dyndolod-226/?p=204312]this post[/url] by Sheson for more information).

Make sure to click the worldspace "BSHeartland" and generate LOD

3.  Enjoy (and post pics when you get a chance!)


REQUIREMENTS:


[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62698/?]TES5LODGen [/url]

or

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59721/?]DynDOLOD[/url]

[/size]



[img]https://68.media.tumblr.com/45eed26913fae66170bc1f26345644ca/tumblr_oshvykLnhu1s2ptqso1_540.jpg[/img]



[size=5]Tutorials: 

[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1_5MWqeHIzw]GamerPoets DynDOLOD Start to Finish[/url]

Reddit thread [url=https://www.reddit.com/r/skyrimmods/comments/2ygf43/how_to_use_tes5lodgen/]tutorial for TES5LODGen[/url]
[/size][size=5]
[/size]


[size=4]
Credits: Zilav for the amazing[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60733/?] billboard generator[/url] tool[/size][/center]
author: mobiusbelmont
